data.message: Please friends help me to stop this person Chu Chiao Wang,and her husband Thomas Hodges,I got ripped off for $1000, with a LOUIS VUITTON fake bag, and I did find another victim from her she sold her 2 fake bags for $2500, she is in F.B. - CCBELLAVITA.E.U. messenger her, and tell her to stop, email-CCBELLAVITA@GMX.COM.

replies.message: Hi Melanie. The best way to report something on Facebook is by using the Report link that appears near the content itself. To learn more, please visit our Help Center at: http://bit.ly/2qwFGJB. -Neha
